verses.verse: Paul,<WG3972> an apostle<WG652> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> by the commandment<WG2003> of God<WG2316> our Savior,<WG4990> and Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> which<WG3588> is our hope;<WG1680>

To Timothy,<WG5095> my own<WG1103> son<WG5043> in the faith:<WG4102> Grace,<WG5485> mercy,<WG1656> and peace,<WG1515> from God<WG2316> our Father<WG3962> and Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> our Lord.<WG2962>

As I sought<WG3870> you to abide<WG4357> still<WG4357> at<WG1722> Ephesus,<WG2181> when I went<WG4198> into<WG1519> Macedonia,<WG3109> that you might charge<WG3853> some<WG5100> that they teach<WG2085> no<WG3361> other<WG2085> doctrine,

Neither<WG3366> give heed<WG4337> to fables<WG3454> and endless<WG562> genealogies,<WG1076> which<WG3748> minister<WG3930> questions,<WG2214> rather<WG3123> than<WG2228> godly<WG2316> edifying<WG3618> which<WG3588> is in faith:<WG4102> so do.
Now<WG1161> the end<WG5056> of the commandment<WG3852> is charity<WG26> out of a pure<WG2513> heart,<WG2588> and of a good<WG18> conscience,<WG4893> and of faith<WG4102> unfeigned:<WG505>
From which<WG3739> some<WG5100> having swerved<WG795> have turned<WG1624> aside<WG1624> to vain<WG3150> jangling;<WG3150>
Desiring<WG2309> to be teachers<WG3547> of the law;<WG3547> understanding<WG4920> neither<WG3383> what<WG3739> they say,<WG3004> nor<WG3383> whereof<WG4012> <WG5101> they affirm.<WG1226>
But we know<WG1492> that the law<WG3551> is good,<WG2570> if<WG1437> a man<WG5100> use<WG5530> it lawfully;<WG3545>

Knowing<WG1492> this,<WG5124> that the law<WG3551> is not made<WG2749> for a righteous<WG1342> man, but for the lawless<WG459> and disobedient,<WG506> for the ungodly<WG765> and for sinners,<WG268> for unholy<WG462> and profane,<WG952> for murderers<WG3964> of fathers<WG3964> and murderers<WG3389> of mothers,<WG3389> for murderers,<WG409>

For fornicators,<WG4205> for them that defile<WG733> themselves with mankind,<WG733> for enslavers,<WG405> for liars,<WG5583> for perjured<WG1965> persons,<WG678> and if<WG1487> there be any<WG1536> other<WG2087> thing that is contrary<WG480> to sound<WG5198> doctrine;<WG1319>
According<WG2596> to the glorious<WG1391> gospel<WG2098> of the blessed<WG3107> God,<WG2316> which<WG3739> was committed<WG4100> to my trust.<WG4100>

And I thank<WG2192> <WG5485> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> our Lord,<WG2962> who<WG3588> has enabled<WG1743> me, for that he counted<WG2233> me faithful,<WG4103> putting<WG5087> me into<WG1519> the ministry;<WG1248>

Who<WG3588> was before<WG4386> a blasphemer,<WG989> and a persecutor,<WG1376> and injurious:<WG5197> but I obtained<WG1653> mercy,<WG1653> because<WG3754> I did it ignorantly<WG50> in unbelief.<WG570>
And the grace<WG5485> of our Lord<WG2962> was exceeding<WG5250> abundant<WG5250> with faith<WG4102> and love<WG26> which<WG3588> is in Christ<WG5547> Jesus.<WG2424>

This<WG3588> is a faithful<WG4103> saying,<WG3056> and worthy<WG514> of all<WG3956> acceptation,<WG594> that Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> came<WG2064> into<WG1519> the world<WG2889> to save<WG4982> sinners;<WG268> of whom<WG3739> I am<WG1510> chief.<WG4413>

However,<WG235> for this<WG5124> cause<WG1223> I obtained<WG1653> mercy,<WG1653> that in me first<WG4413> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> might show<WG1731> forth<WG1731> all<WG3956> long-suffering,<WG3115> for a pattern<WG5296> to them which should<WG3195> hereafter<WG3195> believe<WG4100> on<WG1909> him to life<WG2222> everlasting.<WG166>

Now<WG1161> to the King<WG935> eternal,<WG165> immortal,<WG862> invisible,<WG517> the only<WG3441> wise<WG4680> God,<WG2316> be honor<WG5092> and glory<WG1391> for ever<WG165> and ever.<WG165> Amen.<WG281>

This<WG5026> charge<WG3852> I commit<WG3908> to you, son<WG5043> Timothy,<WG5095> according<WG2596> to the prophecies<WG4394> which went<WG4254> before<WG4254> on<WG1909> you, that you by them might war<WG4754> a good<WG2570> warfare;<WG4752>
Holding<WG2192> faith,<WG4102> and a good<WG18> conscience;<WG4893> which<WG3739> some<WG5100> having put<WG683> away<WG683> concerning<WG4012> faith<WG4102> have made<WG3489> shipwreck:<WG3489>
Of whom<WG3739> is Hymenaeus<WG5211> and Alexander;<WG223> whom<WG3739> I have delivered<WG3860> to Satan,<WG4567> that they may learn<WG3811> not to blaspheme.<WG987>
